The $80 billion we spend each year to keep people incarcerated could pay for universal pre-K for every 3-year-old and 4-year-old in America.

text: More than 137 million Americans have guaranteed access to preventive care like cancer screenings and birth control at no out-of-pocket cost.

column4: affordable health care is a right
